title: Prominent Ukrainian politician Andriy Parubiy shot dead in Lviv
description: President Zelensky said the killing of Parubiy was an "terrible murder" and promised an investigation.
content:
Prominent Ukrainian politician Andriy Parubiy shot dead in Lviv
Parubiy was a former secretary of Ukraine's National Security and Defence Council
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky described it as a "terrible murder" and offered his condolences.
